name: R-ROW Demo
description:
This is a demo project, using R-ROW game engine.

R-ROW is a simple TypeScript 2D game engine.

For more informations about R-ROW project, visit the github page.

Assets:

  • Minifantasy Dungeon (free) by Krishna Palacio
  • Mouse Cursor Pack by Megabyte Games
  • 8 bit SFX pack by Maskedsound
  • Free 8 bits music pack 4 by Destiny Knight
  • Tiny Nostalgia by Wherbe
  • Humble Fonts Free by somepx
  • ork-fantasy-warrior-troll-monster by Yuri_B
